Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to Ghost Town and Romantic Entanglements
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of Ghost Town and the initial romantic conflicts, primarily focusing on Nan, Cal, and the arrival of surveyors with plans to build an airport.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Conflict and Cowboy's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the initial conflict between the woman in green hat (Nan) and the cowboy (Cal) in Ghost Town, leading to the cowboy's frustrated departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Girl from Ghost Town and Initial Conflict

sub_scenes.title: Airport Plan and Town Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the surveyors and the airport plan, showing the initial reactions from Nan and the cowboy to this news, setting up town-level conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Surveyors and the Airport Plan
Cowboy's Shock and the Impending Destruction of Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Nan and Cal's Romantic Misunderstanding and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Nan and Cal's continued romantic misunderstanding, culminating in Nan's departure and reflection.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Romantic Misunderstanding and Parting
Nan's Reflection on Love and Past Hurt

Major_Arcs.title: Rising Town Tension and Nan's Humiliation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalating tension in Ghost Town with the arrival of rough men and shifts to Nan's personal struggles and humiliation.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival of Rough Men and Community Discontent
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces new characters and escalates town tension with the arrival of rough men and community resentment towards 'progress'.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Rough Men and Discontent with 'Progress'

sub_scenes.title: Businessmen, Father's Scolding and Nan's Humiliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to Nan's personal humiliation, first with businessmen and then with her father, leading to her emotional distress.

narrative_arcs.title: Businessmen Discuss Airport and Horses, Nan Interjects

Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Resolve and Cal's Return
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tracks Nan's emotional journey from being consoled to resolving to confront Cal, and then depicts Cal's unexpected return and confession.

sub_scenes.title: Consolation and Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan being comforted by her mother and maid, leading to her resolve to confront Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother and Maid Console Nan About Cal

sub_scenes.title: Business Interlude and Cal's Departure Again
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene briefly shifts to a business matter before returning to Nan and Cal's strained interaction and Cal's departure.

sub_scenes.title: Loneliness, Reflection and Cal's Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Nan's loneliness and reflection after Cal's departure, followed by Cal's unexpected return and confession.

Major_Arcs.title: Winter Storm and Community Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the focus to a severe winter storm impacting Ghost Town, and the community's response, highlighting the struggle for survival and community reliance.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Conversation and Arrival of Winter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Nan and Cal's emotional conversation, transitioning to the arrival of harsh winter weather.

sub_scenes.title: Community Worry and Seeking Comfort
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the community's worry about the livestock in the face of the snowstorm, and a brief moment of seeking comfort indoors.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Crisis and Cal's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene escalates the snowstorm crisis and shows Cal's decisive resolve to act, highlighting the gravity of the situation.

sub_scenes.title: Despair, Hope and Aerial Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene moves from despair to faint hope and then to relief with the arrival of a plane dropping fodder, providing a turning point in the crisis.

narrative_arcs.title: Hope from the Sky: Arrival of the Plane and Fodder

sub_scenes.title: Reflection on Romance Amidst Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the winter crisis section with Nan and Cal reflecting on romance in the context of the day's events, offering a moment of personal reflection.

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Jeff's Troubled Path
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and shifts focus to Jeff's troubled character and his relationship with his sister and Clyde, highlighting themes of hero worship and violence.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Gossip
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through a dramatic showdown and shows the divergent opinions and gossip among the townspeople about him.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Childhood Hero Worship and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene delves into Jeff's troubled character, exploring his unhealthy hero worship of his father and his sister's attempts to guide him.

narrative_arcs.title: Reminiscing About Jeff's Childhood Hero Worship
Justifying Actions with Clyde Surrett's Example
Dismissing Chane Benson and Embracing Violence

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help for Jeff and Clyde's Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the woman's desperation to help Jeff, seeking Clyde's assistance and finding reassurance in their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Expressing Fear and Seeking Help from Clyde
Declaration of Love and Duty Towards Jeff
Reassurance and Promise of Shared Happiness

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Introduction of Mr. Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene marks Jeff's disappearance and introduces Mr. Benson, setting up new plot developments and character interactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Pursuit to Town
Introduction of Mr. Benson and Seeking Advice
Chane Benson's Menacing Demeanor and Disdain for Young Boys

Major_Arcs.title: Article's Repercussions and Dinner with Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the fallout from an article about Chane Benson, leading to threats and a dinner invitation as a strategy to manage the situation.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation over Article and Editor's Stand
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the confrontation between Sally and Clyde regarding an article about Benson, and the Editor's decision to stand against Benson's threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation about the Article and Benson's Threat
Warning about Benson's Cunning and Cowardice
Seeking Action from the Editor and Decision to Stay

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation Strategy and Eventful Dinner
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves planning a dinner invitation for Benson, and the depiction of the dinner itself, filled with tension and subtle demonstrations.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Unwavering Resolve and Benson's Character
Shifting Opinions and Dinner Invitation Idea

Major_Arcs.title: Moonlight Confrontation and Escalating Violence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a moonlight encounter that escalates into a tense confrontation, physical altercation, and ultimately a race against time to rescue Clyde.

sub_scenes.title: Moonlight Charm and Rising Tension
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with a seemingly charming moonlight scene, but quickly escalates into confrontation and accusations.

sub_scenes.title: Fight, Insults and Race to Rescue Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in a physical fight, insults exchanged, and Sally's urgent warning that leads to a race to rescue Clyde.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight, Warning, and Race to Rescue Clyde

Major_Arcs.title: Capture, Clarion Office and Newspaper's Role
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Clyde's capture, flashbacks to the Clarion office, and the newspaper's role in responding to the crisis, emphasizing courage and decency.

sub_scenes.title: Showdown and Capture of Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the immediate showdown and capture of Clyde by Benson and his men, resolving the chase but escalating the danger.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Clarion Office Response
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes a flashback to the tense atmosphere of the Clarion office and the subsequent efforts to manage the news and print the next edition.

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley and Ranch Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Steve Daley at the Double B Ranch, depicting initial conflicts and setting up ranch management issues and romantic developments.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation and Introduction of Steve Daley
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with a ranch confrontation and introduces Steve Daley as the new hire at the Double B ranch.

sub_scenes.title: Bunk Assignment, Hiring Justification and Ranch Problems
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Steve's bunk assignment, Hank's justification for hiring Steve, and the revelation of ranch problems.

sub_scenes.title: Buckboard Ride, Town Arrival and Dress Material
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy and Steve's buckboard ride to town, including Betsy's reflections and a stop for dress material.

Major_Arcs.title: Town Confrontation and Betsy's Boldness
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases Betsy's boldness in town, leading to a confrontation and Steve demonstrating his skills as a bodyguard.

sub_scenes.title: Town Gossip and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with town gossip about Betsy and leads to a direct confrontation with some men in town.

sub_scenes.title: Slap, Retaliation and Knockout Punch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the escalating physical confrontation, featuring a slap, retaliation, and a knockout punch by Steve.

Major_Arcs.title: Bodyguard Role Confirmed and Romantic Turn
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc confirms Steve's role as Betsy's bodyguard and sees a romantic turn in their relationship, culminating in a love confession and embrace.

sub_scenes.title: Bodyguard Decision and Hank's Plea
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene confirms Betsy's decision to hire Steve as bodyguard and includes Hank's desperate plea to keep his job.

narrative_arcs.title: Hank's Job Secured and Gratitude Expressed

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Development and Embrace
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene marks a significant romantic development between Betsy and Steve, featuring job conditions, a choice for Steve, and culminating in a romantic confession and embrace.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarification and Choice about Gunfighter Role
Betsy's Change of Heart and Plea to Stay

Major_Arcs.title: Bridges' Confrontation and Devil's Pass Tragedy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new conflict with Old Man Bridges, escalating into threats and revealing a past tragedy at Devil's Pass involving Hank.

sub_scenes.title: Bridges' Arrival and Escalating Threats
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Old Man Bridges' arrival and confrontation with Betsy, escalating from verbal warnings to gun threats.

sub_scenes.title: Analysis of War and Hank's Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes commentary on the confrontation as a declaration of war and a flashback revealing Hank's ambush and death at Devil's Pass.

narrative_arcs.title: Analysis of the Confrontation as a Declaration of War
Betsy's Assertion of Authority and Gun Ownership
Steve's Reflection, Flashback to Ambush, and Hank's Fate

Major_Arcs.title: Pursuit to Devil's Pass and Romantic Reunion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Steve's determined departure to Devil's Pass, Betsy's pursuit, and the violent confrontation and romantic reunion that follows.

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Departure and Betsy's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Steve's determined departure and Betsy's subsequent contemplation and pursuit to Devil's Pass.

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Shooting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the violent confrontation at Devil's Pass, including threats, shooting, and Betsy's injury.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Romantic Reunion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the aftermath of the shooting, Betsy's survival, and the romantic reunion between Betsy and Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Survival and Reunion with Steve

Major_Arcs.title: New Ranch Conflicts and Carrie-Dave-Fred Drama
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces new ranch-related conflicts and shifts focus to a new romantic drama involving Carrie, Dave, and Fred.

sub_scenes.title: Argument about Dave and Curley's Actions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with an argument concerning Dave and then shifts to Curley's unexpected actions in the corral, introducing new ranch-related tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Trouble with Bar Fenin Ranch and Fence Dispute
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a territorial dispute with Bar Fenin ranch buyers and details a fence dispute impacting water access.

narrative_arcs.title: Trouble with Bar Fenin Ranch Buyers
Discussing the Fence and Range Issues

sub_scenes.title: Fred Gordon's Confrontation and Gunfight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Fred Gordon's confrontational arrival at the fence and the ensuing gunfight, escalating the ranch conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Fred Gordon's Confrontation at the Fence

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Reconciliation and Fred's Reappearance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Carrie and Dave's reconciliation, their interaction with Fred, and Fred's ominous reappearance, setting up renewed tension.

narrative_arcs.title: Intimate Conversation and Reflection on Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Resolution and Carlton Contract Drama
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc resolves the romantic tension between Carrie and Dave, but introduces new conflict related to the Carlton contract and Fred's manipulations.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Fred and Romantic Resolution with Dave
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's confrontation with Fred, a private conversation with Dave, and a romantic resolution with Dave through a proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Misunderstandings and Romantic Resolution

sub_scenes.title: Carlton Contract Betrayal and Determined Action
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Carlton contract proposition, Carrie's angry confrontation with Dave over betrayal, and her determined action against Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Inquiry with Dave and Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Carlton's Office and Final Resolution with Fred
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc moves the action to Mr. Carlton's office, culminating in a final confrontation with Fred and Carrie's emotional release and victory.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Carlton's Office and History
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie and Fred's arrival at Mr. Carlton's office and introduces the historical business relationship with Carrie's father.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Interruption at Carlton's Office
Carlton's Business History and Carrie's Resolution

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Comfort and Fred's Defeat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Carrie finding emotional comfort with her father and then confronting Fred, leading to Fred's concession and defeat.

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie's Independence and Reunion with Dave
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Carrie asserting her independence and then having a significant encounter with Dave, leading to a confession of love for Fred.

sub_scenes.title: Declaration of Independence and Bar Gossip
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Carrie's declaration of independence and her unexpected encounter with Dave, including bar gossip about Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Declaration of Independence and Western Identity

sub_scenes.title: Love Question, Confession and Departure Plans
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contains Carrie's emotional turmoil, her confession of love for Fred, and her decision to leave.

narrative_arcs.title: Anger, Apology, and Question of Love
Father's Wisdom and Long Ride Home

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Reunion with Fred and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc resolves Carrie's romantic journey with Fred, featuring reflection, reunion, and a final romantic climax.

sub_scenes.title: Father's Wisdom and Reunion Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie reflecting on her father's wisdom and sets up the hastened reunion with Fred through Fred's brother's arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Reunion, Assurance and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Carrie and Fred's reunion, assurance of love, and culminates in a romantic climax and resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Dave's Words and Embracing Love

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Chris's Storyline - Chase and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a separate storyline focusing on Dirk and Chris, involving a desperate plea, injury revelation, chase, shooting, and ultimate romantic resolution for Rance and Chris.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Plea and Injury Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dirk's desperate plea at Chris's window and reveals the true extent of his injury - a gunshot wound.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Forced Ranch Search
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to an investigation involving a gun and a ranch search, introducing new characters and setting.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Search and Blood Stained Pinto

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation, Duty and Unguarded Dirk
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a confrontation about Dirk's actions, a discussion of duty and justice, and a friend's concern for unguarded Dirk.

sub_scenes.title: Unexpected Reunion and Resignation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a reflective moment leading to an unexpected reunion and a tone of resignation from the woman in red dress.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Confession and Pursuit Planning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Chris's romantic confession to Rance, their mutual declaration of love, and planning the pursuit of Dirk.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase, Shooting and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the chase, the violent confrontation between Rance and Dirk leading to a shooting, and the immediate aftermath and moral dilemma.

sub_scenes.title: Departure, Confession and Distant Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the difficult departure, Chris's confession of love for Rance, and Dirk's escape to Mexico, posing a distant threat.

narrative_arcs.title: The Difficult Departure and Lingering Feelings

Major_Arcs.title: Rance and Chris's Romantic Resolution and Wedding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with Rance's recovery, his romantic reunion with Chris, their engagement and wedding, and a final resolution with Dirk.

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Awakening and Mutual Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Rance regaining consciousness, and the mutual confession of love between Rance and Chris.

narrative_arcs.title: Mutual Feelings and Confession of Love

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Preparations and Dirk's Appearance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows wedding preparations and Dirk's unexpected and dramatic arrival at the wedding.

narrative_arcs.title: Chris's Concern and Rance's Reassurance about Dirk

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Plan and Dirk's Fate Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the Marshal's plan and provides backstory, resolving Dirk's fate and concluding the narrative.

narrative_arcs.title: The Marshal's Appreciation and Wedding Gift
